content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROC [dbo].[spExecuteDetectFraud] AS
BEGIN

TRUNCATE TABLE [Report].ClaimsFraudSummaryload

INSERT INTO [Report].ClaimsFraudSummaryload
SELECT 
      [ClaimFIRNo]
      ,[ClaimType]
      ,[HospitalizationType]
      ,[ClassofAccommodation]
      ,[Procedure]
      ,[Diagnosis]
      ,[policyNo]
      ,[PolicyType]
      ,[member_code]
      ,[FullMemberName]
      ,[Gender]
      ,[Age]
      ,[Hospital]
      ,[Corporate]
      ,[LengthofStay]
      ,[output_label1] IsFraudClaim
      ,[FraudScore]
      ,[ClaimAmount]
      ,[ClaimDate] 
FROM PREDICT (MODEL = (SELECT [model] FROM dbo.[ClaimsMLModelExt] WHERE [ID] = 'sampesynapseworkspace-claimsfraudmldata-20210507054541-Best:1'),
              DATA = [dbo].[ClaimsSummary],
              RUNTIME = ONNX) WITH ([output_label1] [varchar])

END

GO
